Key Match Events: England chased down the U.S. target of 116 with a mammoth 62 balls to spare
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Jones: 'We weren't as disciplined as we should be. It was similar to the last game and something we will have to talk about.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: England are defending champions at this shortest format of the sport
The U.S. qualified for the Super Eights after victories over Canada and Pakistan in the group stage coupled with a rain-enforced washout against Ireland
Others: The U.S. lost to South Africa in the previous match and suffered a heavy defeat by West Indies in the match before England
The winners will face off against two of India, Australia, Afghanistan or Bangladesh in the semifinals before the final in Bridgetown on June 29
